00037 #ifndef __INET_NETINET_IN_SYSTM_H
00038 #define __INET_NETINET_IN_SYSTM_H
00039 
00040 /*
00041  * Miscellaneous internetwork
00042  * definitions for kernel.
00043  */
00044 
00045 /*
00046  * Network types.
00047  *
00048  * Internally the system keeps counters in the headers with the bytes
00049  * swapped so that VAX instructions will work on them.  It reverses
00050  * the bytes before transmission at each protocol level.  The n_ types
00051  * represent the types with the bytes in ``high-ender'' order.
00052  */
00053 typedef u_int16_t n_short;              /* short as received from the net */
00054 typedef u_int32_t n_long;               /* long as received from the net */
00055 
00056 typedef u_int32_t n_time;               /* ms since 00:00 GMT, byte rev */
00057 
00058 /*...*/
00059 
00060 #endif
